original_text: But if ye have respect to persons, ye commit sin, and are convinced of the law as transgressors.
korean_text: 만일 너희가 사람을 차별하여 대하면 죄를 짓는 것이니 율법이 너희를 범법자로 정죄하리라

sentences.original_text: But if ye have respect to persons
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 만약 너희가 사람을 외모로 취급하면

sentences.original_text: and are convinced of the law
